name: PHP - Performance Monitoring
description: Advanced PHP configuration with performance monitoring and custom hooks
useCase: Production PHP applications requiring detailed performance insights
seGuidance: Use this configuration for high-traffic PHP applications. The before_send hook allows filtering or modifying events before they're sent. Use traces_sampler for dynamic sampling based on transaction context. Consider using queue workers to send events asynchronously.
configCode:
<?php

use Sentry\Event;
use Sentry\EventHint;
use Sentry\SamplingContext;

\Sentry\init([
    'dsn' => 'https://examplePublicKey@o0.ingest.sentry.io/0',
    'environment' => 'production',
    'release' => 'my-php-app@1.0.0',
    
    // Performance monitoring
    'traces_sample_rate' => 0.1,
    
    // Custom traces sampler
    'traces_sampler' => function (SamplingContext $context): float {
        // Don't trace health checks
        if ($context->getTransactionContext()->getName() === 'GET /health') {
            return 0.0;
        }
        return 0.1;
    },
    
    // Filter events before sending
    'before_send' => function (Event $event, ?EventHint $hint): ?Event {
        // Filter out specific exceptions
        if ($hint !== null && $hint->exception instanceof \App\Exceptions\IgnoredException) {
            return null;
        }
        return $event;
    },
    
    // Capture user context
    'send_default_pii' => false,
    
    // Include only app code in stack traces
    'in_app_include' => ['app/'],
    'in_app_exclude' => ['vendor/'],
]);
